about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a dedicated software engineer with experience in building and maintaining web applications. My expertise spans across various technologies in the .NET ecosystem and modern web development frameworks. I have a strong foundation in full-stack development, with a recent focus on .NET technologies and cloud platforms like Azure and AWS.
